author: CTV News
title: Ground News - Snowfall warning issued for Greater Toronto Area and other parts of Ontario
text:
Summary by CTV News Environment Canada has issued a snowfall warning for Toronto and much of the Greater Toronto Area ahead of a snowstorm that could dump as much as 15 cm of snow in some areas later today. Explore further questions using the
Ground News AI Assistant for deeper insights. Try it Now
